timeline.bodyText:
We need to make sure that older content packs (without this field) are still installable.
I suggest you initialize the htmlBodyTemplate in the Builder.create()
https://github.com/Graylog2/graylog2-server/pull/9790/files#diff-455b0c407c9c4eac48cf30ae314d1e2222e29fb27954534f291d6a84b3facf87L70
.htmlBodyTemplate(ValueReference.of(""))

timeline.bodyText: This should be an empty String by default. We don't want to automatically upgrade existing notifications to HTML.
